original_text: and they shall be on Aaron and on his sons when they go into the tent of meeting or when they come near the altar to minister in the Holy Place, lest they bear guilt and die. This shall be a statute forever for him and for his offspring after him.
korean_text: 아론과 그의 아들들이 회막에 들어갈 때에나 제단에 가까이 하여 거룩한 곳에서 섬길 때에 그것들을 입어야 죄를 짊어진 채 죽지 아니하리니 그와 그의 후손이 영원히 지킬 규례니라

sentences.original_text: and they shall be on Aaron and on his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들은 아론과 그의 아들들이 입어야 하며

sentences.original_text: when they go into the tent of meeting
or when they come near the altar
to minister in the Holy Place
lest they bear guilt and die
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 죄를 입어 죽지 않게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: This shall be a statute forever
for him and for his offspring after him
